name: Du Toitskloof Tunnel White
description: Du Toitskloofs easy-drinking and fun-loving Tunnel wine range is named after the old Tunnel in the Du Toitskloof mountain pass. Built by former Italian prisoners of World War II, this tunnel opened up the famous winelands of the Breedekloof region to cars and people, joining two great South African wine producing regions, namely the area of Stellenbosch, Paarl and Franschhoek with that of the Breedekloof, home of Du Toitskloof Wines.
